member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.ReadAnalog(System.Byte,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Reads the specified Analog Channel value on the remote card.
member.param: Specifies the channel on the remote card. Valid channels: 0, 1, 2, and 3.
A reference byte storage location for the received data. Byte value (0 - 255).

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.WriteAnalog(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the specified Analog Channel value on the remote card. Returns CardStatus.PortReadOnly if an Input Port ID is specified.
member.param: Specifies the channel on the remote card. Valid channels: 0, 1, 2, and 3.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.ReadPort(System.Byte,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Reads the specified Input/Output Port value on the remote card.
member.param: Specifies the Port ID on the remote card. Valid Input / Output Ports ID: 0, 1, 2, and 3.
A reference byte storage location for the received data. Value of 8 bits. (Number value 0 for LOW or value >= 1 for HIGH.)

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.WritePort(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the specified Output Port value on the remote card. Returns CardStatus.PortReadOnly if an Input Port ID is specified.
member.param: Specifies the Port ID on the remote card. Valid Output Ports ID: 2 and 3.
Value of 8 bits. (Number value 0 for LOW or value >= 1 for HIGH.)

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.SetLed(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Sets the LED value on the remote card.
member.param: Specifies the LED number on the remote card. A specified value of 0 will control all LEDs on the card.
Number value 0 for LOW or value >= 1 for HIGH.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.GetDeviceAddress(System.Byte@)
member.summary: Returns the current remote card Device Address.
member.param: A reference byte storage location for the received data.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.GetFirmwareVersion(System.String@,System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns the current remote card Firmware Version.
member.param: A reference string storage location for the received data.
Specifies the array size of the type char* storage location.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.GetDeviceInfo(System.String@,System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns the current remote card Device Information.
member.param: A reference string storage location for the received data.
Specifies the array size of the type char* storage location.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.GetConnectionType
member.summary: Returns the current remote card ConnectType value.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.Close
member.summary: Closes the IO1616Card connection and releases all associated resources.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.ConnectRS485(System.Byte,System.String)
member.summary: Establishes an RS485 connection to a remote IO1616 card.
member.param: An address that represents the remote card.
The port to use (for example, COM1).
member.returns: Returns true if the connection to the remote card is completed. Returns false if the connection to the remote card fails.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.ConnectUSB(System.Byte)
member.summary: Establishes a USB connection to a remote IO1616 card.
member.param: An address that represents the remote card.
member.returns: Returns true if the connection to the remote card is completed. Returns false if the connection to the remote card fails.

member.name: M:Creden.Hardware.Cards.IO1616Card.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the IO1616Card class.

member.name: T:Creden.Hardware.Cards.CardStatus
member.summary: Represents the operation status of any Creden.Hardware.Cards commands.

member.name: T:Creden.Hardware.Cards.ConnectionType
member.summary: Specifies the type of connection that an instance of any Creden.Hardware.Cards classes represents.
